abstract.t: Our protocol embeds a destination-driven feature into the on-demand multicast structure building process of an existing multicast protocol ODMRP (On-Demand Multicast Routing Protocol), which is a mesh-based multicast scheme and uses a forwarding group concept. The design objective of destination-driven on-demand multicast routing protocol (D-ODMRP) is to improve the multicast forwarding efficiency for wireless Ad Hoc networks. To achieve this goal, the path to reach a multicast destination is biased towards those paths passing through another multicast destination.
